thread.title: Hudson Materials Company
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Hudson Materials Company

author: Hudson Materials Company
title: Hudson Materials Company
text: The Live Chat representative put me in touch with a Customer Service Representative, Tatianna, who called me back immediately and offered potential solutions to my questions. She was pleasant, knowledgeable, professional and patient with me as a first-time ZipRecruiter user.
